titles.title: Oh Refuge Of My Hardened Heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh refuge of my hardened heart
Oh fast pursuing lover come
As angels dance around Your throne
My life by captured fare you own

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh gaze of love so melt my pride
That I may in Your house but kneel
And in my brokenness to cry
Spring worship unto Thee

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Not silhouette of trodden faith
Nor death shall
not my steps by guide
I'll pirouette upon my grave
For in Your path I'll run and hide

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When beauty breaks the spell of pain
The bludgeoned heart shall burst in vain
But not when loves be pointed king
And truth shall Thee forever reign

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Sweet Jesus, carry me away
For cold of night and dust of day
In fagged hour or salt worn eye
Be my desire, my well spring nigh
